item.title: Fixing "FATAL:udev_loader.cc(38) Check failed: false." errors on NixOS
item.description: This is a problem that I ran into while figuring out how to get Pixelator running–the issue is that electron apps expect to be linked against the old libudev.

item.title: How to Install Pixelator on NixOS
item.description: Download Pixelator. Clone my fork of nix-patchtools. Modify examples/pixelator.

item.title: How to Look up a URL's PageRank with Ruby + Open PageRank's API
item.description: DomCom’s Open PageRank is a free alternative to Google’s PageRank and includes a public API.

item.title: Black progress
item.description: From 2001 to 2017, the incarceration rate for black men declined by 34 percent.

item.title: As hedge fund grandma used to say
item.description: A truism at the commodities hedge fund I used to work at was the “the Saudis are always lying” along with “never be long a country’s currency if they have their own word for afternoon nap”

item.title: Clowns to the left of me, secret police to the right
item.description: We find that low‐achieving officers were stuck within the regime hierarchy, threatened with discharge, and thus more likely to join the secret police for future benefits.

item.title: Communists have the best transit
item.description: Subways in Beijing are roughly 55 cents, only about 1/5th the level of NYC.

item.description: Between 2013 and 2016, 90% of Oracle’s hires were people of color.

item.title: Mushrooms & civilization
item.description: Psilocybin mushrooms occur in higher concentrations around human settlements than in “wild nature” (still today).

item.title: Would you hire Elon Musk?
item.description:
We find that former founders receive fewer callbacks than non-founders; however, all founders are not disadvantaged similarly. Former founders of successful ventures receive even fewer callbacks than former founders of failed ventures.

–The Effect of Founder Experience on Labor Market Outcomes: A Field Experiment (emphasis mine)

item.title: How to: Generate Rails-Compatible html.erb with Hugo
item.description: Here’s how this site is currently generated: This works really great but, thing is, I’ve been experimenting with Rails and I discovered a feature I gotta have: split, the hacker-friendly A/B framework.

item.title: How to: GPU-Accelerated R/Keras on NixOS (via Docker)
item.description: I spent a weekend trying to get R, Keras, and CUDA to play nice together on NixOS. I suspect this’ll be the task I’m assigned on my first day in Hell.

item.title: Links for June

item.title: “The Ask” is an Entrepreneur’s Core Skill
item.description:
+ Other Notes on Entrepreneurial Expertise

I’ve been going through the second edition of the Cambridge Handbook of Expertise after reading the first years ago, and was delighted to find the new edition has a chapter on excellence among entrepreneurs.

Some highlights:
